description: Dylan McLovin thought it'd be safe to sneak off to the bathroom for some alone time. He was wrong.Marcus happened to be in that area of the house and heard suspicious noises coming from the bathroom. When he went to investigate, he found McLovin stroking his cock. Of course this wasn't a surprise to him, but he was somewhat disappointed that he wasn't invited. Needless to say, by the end of the scene, each of them is quite satisfied.Enjoy!
title: Dylan McLovin & Marcus
